message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can seal the deal!
Not bad, but I can do better. Your turn!
Let's meet in the middle. Accept and we can finalize the deal!
You're getting closer, but I'm not ready to settle yet. Keep trying!
I'm getting closer to your number. Is this the final stretch?
We're getting close to a tie. Time to make a strong move!
I'm willing to give you a bit more. Don't let it slip away!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. Make it worth my while!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not backing down. Time to think outside the box!
I'm running out of time and patience. This is my last serious offer.
It's now or never. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing!
